sentence: “Pennsylvania’s farmers trusted Comrey to complete and submit important plans on their behalf, plans that could make or break their farming operations,” said Attorney General Josh Shapiro in the press release.
author: Avery Van Etten
title: Pa. attorney general suing woman who allegedly scammed farmers

author: James Wesser
title: This Week in Pennsylvania: Natalie Mihalek & Wendell Young

sentence: He will then speak to Attorney General and governor hopeful Josh Shapiro.
author: James Wesser
title: This Week in Pennsylvania: Josh Shapiro & other Pa. news
